# ec_deployment_templates (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve a list of available deployment templates.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ec_deployment_templates" "example" {
  region = "us-east-1"
}
```

### Creating a deployment from a deployment template

```terraform
data "ec_deployment_templates" "all_templates" {
  region = "aws-eu-west-1"
}

resource "ec_deployment" "my_deployment" {
  name                   = "My Deployment"
  version                = "8.12.2"
  region                 = data.ec_deployment_templates.all_templates.region
  deployment_template_id = data.ec_deployment_templates.all_templates.templates.0.id

  elasticsearch = {
    hot = {
      autoscaling = {}
    }
  }

  kibana = {}
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `region` (String) Region to select. For Elastic Cloud Enterprise (ECE) installations, use `ece-region`.

### Optional

- `id` (String) Filters for a deployment template with this id.
- `show_deprecated` (Boolean) Enable to also show deprecated deployment templates. (Set to false by default.)
- `stack_version` (String) Filters for deployment templates compatible with this stack version.

### Read-Only

- `templates` (Attributes List) List of available deployment templates. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates))

<a id="nestedatt--templates"></a>
### Nested Schema for `templates`

Read-Only:

- `apm` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for a stateless application (Kibana, Enterprise Search, APM or
  Integrations Server). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--apm))
- `deprecated` (Boolean) Outdated templates are marked as deprecated, but can still be used.
- `description` (String) The description of the deployment template.
- `elasticsearch` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for Elasticsearch. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch))
- `enterprise_search` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for a stateless application (Kibana, Enterprise
  Search, APM or Integrations Server). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--enterprise_search))
- `id` (String) The id of the deployment template.
- `integrations_server` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for a stateless application (Kibana, Enterprise
  Search, APM or Integrations Server). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--integrations_server))
- `kibana` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for a stateless application (Kibana, Enterprise Search, APM or
  Integrations Server). (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--kibana))
- `min_stack_version` (String) The minimum stack version that can used with this deployment template.
- `name` (String) The name of the deployment template.

<a id="nestedatt--templates--apm"></a>
### Nested Schema for `templates.apm`

Read-Only:

- `available_sizes` (List of String)
- `default_size` (String)
- `instance_configuration_id` (String)
- `instance_configuration_version` (Number)
- `size_resource` (String)


<a id="nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch"></a>
### Nested Schema for `templates.elasticsearch`

Read-Only:

- `autoscale` (Boolean)
- `cold` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for each topology. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch--cold))
- `coordinating` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for each topology. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch--coordinating))
- `frozen` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for each topology. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch--frozen))
- `hot` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for each topology. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch--hot))
- `master` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for each topology. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch--master))
- `ml` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for each topology. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch--ml))
- `warm` (Attributes) Defines the default configuration for each topology. (
  see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--templates--elasticsearch--warm))
